name: Beep Bap The Beep Boop
storyline:
Robots and... other creatures once lived in peace, until one day Good People Inc.'s robots somehow went rogue!
Now it's up to FunTimez 4 Kidz' signature robot 'Beep Bap' to stop the evil robots and solve this mystery!
summary: Beep Bap The Beep Boop is a 3D platformer inspired by Spyro, Banjo and Zelda! Explore colorful worlds and talk to a variety of charming NPCs! Use your surroundings to aid in combat & use shields to block and parry enemy attacks!

videos.name: Teaser
